column4: has nebody here ever encountered this error when running make: "make[1] : *** No rule to make target"

there is a makefile present

read the readme or install text files to know how to compile you program I guess

what does it says you should do?

quote from INSTALL readme - "4. Do: make acerhk.o  - kernel version 2.4  make acerhk.ko  - kernel version 2.6
in my case, make acerhk.ko, since i'm runnin 2.6.12-9-386
do you have gcc-3.4 installed?
yes - "gcc-3.4 is already the newest version."
